com.viaoa.jfc.text.autocomplete
Class AutoCompleteBase

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.jfc.text.autocomplete.AutoCompleteBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutoCompleteList
public abstract class AutoCompleteBase
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for building an autocomplete lookup. This class does not know the component used in the popup, so it will manage the textField keys to call abstract methods for changing the selected value. The only selection that is captured is when the popup menu is displayed and [enter] is used - see: onSelection()

Constructor Detail

AutoCompleteBase

public AutoCompleteBase(javax.swing.JTextField txt,
                        javax.swing.JComponent popupComponent,
                        boolean bExactMatchOnly)
Create an autoComplete that uses a text and popup component.

Parameters:
txt - user input component that is used to work with popupMenu.
popupComponent - list/table/etc that is displayed with list of choices
bExactMatchOnly - if true, then closest match is always selected.

protected abstract java.lang.String getClosestMatch(java.lang.String value)
Used for exactMatches, to find the closest match to text.

onSelection

protected abstract void onSelection()
Called when user has pressed the "Enter" key, while the popup is visible. The popup component needs to replace the textField text with the selected value from the popup component.
